text: @realDonaldTrump Over 1.1 million COVID-19 cases & over 66,000 deaths. Both increasing daily. This is you legacy. @chrislhayes @JoeBiden @MeetThePress @costareports @ezraklein @MSNBC @JohnJHarwood @HillBeverlyhill @politico @CNN @costareports @PeterAlexander @NicolleDWallace @samstein @Acosta https://t.co/IqIXdzHESf

domain.name: TV Shows
domain.description: Television shows from around the world

entity.name: Meet the Press
entity.description: For almost as long as there has been television, there's been "Meet the Press." The hourlong Sunday morning public affairs program has featured interviews with countless U.S. and world leaders, and has reviewed, analyzed and discussed the news of the week -- all while looking toward the week ahead.

entity.name: COVID-19: Latest news updates from around the world
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
